text: bl aznntm -ayha almwmnwn- 'an tadkhuluu aljnt, wlmma yusibkum min alabtla' mithl ma 'asab almuminin aladhin mdu min qblkm: min alfaqr walamrad walkhawf walreb, wzulzlu bi'anwae almkhawf, hta qal rasuluhum walmuminun maeah -ela sabil alastejal lilnasr min allah teala-: mataa nasr allh? 'ala 'iina nasr allah qarib min almwmnyn
